job_details.experience_required: Extensive experience as a Business Analyst for a large financial institution
job_details.degree_required: Bachelor’s degree in computer science, Information Systems, or Finance

jd: Hello, Hope you are doing Well! I'm currently staffing for an Business Analyst at Washington, DC (Onsite). Below you will find the job description, if you are qualified and interested please send me your Updated Word Document Resume to Jayasurya@yochana.com. My apologies if this position is not an ideal fit, we'll keep you in mind for other suitable positions and referrals would be appreciated. Thank you in advance. Title: Business Analyst Location: Washington, DC (Onsite) Duration: Long term contract on W2 Skills / Experience Required •Education: Bachelor’s degree in computer science, Information Systems, or Finance •Extensive experience as a Business Analyst for a large financial institution •Experience in working in an Agile environment as a Product owner •Team player who works well with technical and non-technical resources. •Extensive experience in gathering business requirements and developing functional specifications, user stories with special emphasis on use cases, acceptance criteria, test cases. •Knowledge of business analysis best practices (such as BABOK) •Experience modeling business processes using a variety of tools and techniques (preferably BPMN) •Experience with Azure Dev Ops for capturing user stories •Experience with process-reengineering and writing SQL queries
